item.title: Phaneron - eEyore鬱 (chillwave, dreamwave, electro-pop)
item.dc:creator: eEyoreSynth
item.description:
Thanks, man! I’ve been wanting to expand some of the bars to be less repetitive but I always get hesitant thinking it’s going to start sounding all messy. I agree the drums/hi-hat could use some work. I’m gonna try coming up with a few different patterns to change out with eachother and see if I can make that hi-hat fit better. Before it was all just kick and snare and was way too dull. Appreciate the feedback, my dude.

Read full topic

item.title: Phaneron - eEyore鬱 (chillwave, dreamwave, electro-pop)
item.dc:creator: Tree
item.description:
Overall, I like it.
I feel like you should expand some of the one bar loops into 2-4 bar loops with more variation so it doesn’t feel too repetitive.
Layering is good imo
The drums could use a little bit of work. Sometimes they feel offbeat and unbalanced, and the hi hat from crate digging that opens and closes should be changed. I like the hi hat, but unfortunately it only has one “tempo” and it doesn’t match the tempo of the song.
Again, overall really good. My two cents, but others might disagree with some of my feedback.

Read full topic
